details.title: An Aspect of Determining the Range of Radar Detection
details.abstract: The determination of the range of radar is carried out according to statistical methods which are not always immediate. For this reason, a parametrical method is proposed which condenses the elements necessary for this calculation in the form of three abaci. Furthermore, a general formula condenses this result, and the formula is extended to the other transmission systems.
details.journal_title: IEEE Transactions on Aerospace and Electronic Systems
